channel.title: cheese-press on Jeff Glass
channel.description: Recent content in cheese-press on Jeff Glass

item.title: Homemade Cheddar Cheese
item.description: Over the past 12 months or so, I've dipped my toes into some basic cheesemaking, including cream cheese, farmer's cheese, and ricotta. But for me, there's no better cheese than a sharp white cheddar, and with an eye toward making cheddar and some other hard cheeses, I've built my own cheese press and my own first hard cheese. The process I used to construct the press is very similar to this instructable.
